title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Teamwork-Based Learner-Driven STEAM Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can select and execute project topics reflecting their personal interests and motivation in team projects.
Learners can specify role distribution and communication strategies within teams using digital tools.
Learners can creatively resolve conflicts arising during team collaboration by incorporating feedback.
Learners can recognize sociocultural support factors and utilize them to maximize team performance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
